definition: surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]

sentences.english: RESULTS The content of gentiopicroside in planting Gentiana is higher than in wild Gentiana.
sentences.chinese: 結果栽培秦艽中龍膽苦苷的含量高於野生秦艽。

sentences.english: RESULTS The content of gentiopicroside in planting Gentiana is higher than in wild Gentiana.
sentences.chinese: 結果栽培秦艽中龍膽苦苷的含量高於野生秦艽。

sentences.english: In the middle of the Qinghai especially in the Huangnan Gentiana the best quality.
sentences.chinese: 在青海尤以黃南產的秦艽質量最佳。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Gentiana planting in Qinghai is superior to wild Gentiana in quality.
sentences.chinese: 結論栽培秦艽的質量優於野生秦艽。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Gentiana planting in Qinghai is superior to wild Gentiana in quality.
sentences.chinese: 結論栽培秦艽的質量優於野生秦艽。

sentences.english: Conclusion Gentiopicrin are chiefly concentrated on the parts of the heart-wooded.
sentences.chinese: 結論秦艽龍膽苦苷主要集中在根心材部分。

sentences.english: Aim To determine the best baking temperature and the corresponding time on Gentiana macrophylla.
sentences.chinese: 目的檢測不同烘乾溫度對秦艽中龍膽苦苷含量的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the morphological basis for identify exactly seeds of Gentiana macrophylla Pall, and Gentiana straminea Maxim.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲準確鑑別秦艽和麻花秦艽種子提供形態學依據。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the morphological basis for identify exactly seeds of Gentiana macrophylla Pall, and Gentiana straminea Maxim.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲準確鑑別秦艽和麻花秦艽種子提供形態學依據。
